attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As such a massive amount of money was taken from the tax coffers to bail out banks,perhaps the government could review carers allowance?
I myself have been financially crippled by being full time carer,and my bank is threatening me over owing them 64pounds the very same bank that is being given state handouts....give carers a better deal action now

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
